skins.shipDescription: Hiyou-class aircraft carrier number one ¨C Hiyou.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Hiyou, Hiyou-class aircraft carrier number one. I'm a light carrier, but my damage control and loading capacity are just as good as a regular carrier's. After Midway, I was a key part of the Mobile Fleet and fought hard to my very last battle...
skins.acquisition: Light carrier Hiyou reporting in. Commander, I won't have you looking down on the Hiyou class just 'cause we're light carriers!
skins.login: Heheh... Let's get some good work done today, Commander.
skins.details: You gonna ask if I wanna go for lunch?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ah, Izumo... I'd like to meet her one day.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm pretty sure mine are larger than Souryuu's...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm slow-witted? Hmph, believe it or not, I'm a girl with a lot on her mind.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: D-didn't I tell you I was lightly armored?!
